title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13ยง 1.2 - Free copies
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13ยง 1.2 - Free copies

State Regulations

Single copies of any departmental item of printing will be furnished without charge
to the Governor; members of the Legislature; heads of other State departments; members of the press; for the necessary and proper use in the conduct
of the official business of the department, schools, libraries and other institutions not carried on for profit. Officers and employees of the

Federal government; officers and employees of any political subdivision of the State of New York; officers and employees of other States and
political subdivisions thereof, whenever such State or other jurisdiction shall extend reciprocal courtesy to this State and its subdivisions; and to
other persons in the discretion of the Attorney-General, not to exceed an annual aggregate of 25 copies for any single item. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13ยง
1.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
